date.StoryBackText: 喏，你也是从远方来的小勇士吗，初来乍到，我们先去拜访一下和蔼可亲的魔导师吧。

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 魔导师把爷爷的东西给你，你是否接受？;快给我，我想看看我爷爷对我说了什么;别给我，我根本不在乎这些
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: The Magistrix Jarl gave you Grandpa's stuff, do you accept it? ;Hurry up, I want to see what my grandpa said to me ;Don't give it to me, I don't care at all
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 你好哇，小伙子，刚才没听到我喊你嘛，为什么不过来！;果然，正如你的爷爷所说，你的天资跟别人不一样，你可以看到别人看不到的东西。;孩子，我也没有你的爷爷的消息，不过你爷爷曾经把一本东西交给过我，你要不要看看上面说了些什么？;这个东西你一定要好好珍惜，在后面他会和你在一起战斗很长时间！;没错，其实你的爷爷是一个很伟大的冒险者，他做了我们都不敢做的事情。;二十年前我和你爷爷为了保护这个小镇一起出发去寻找笼罩在这个小镇上黑暗魔力的源头，一路上我们遇到了许多凶险的魔物。;在与最后的魔王哈里斯的战斗中我和你的爷爷都受了重伤,但是那个魔头受的伤也不轻。;后来那个魔头受伤很重便飞走了，不过由于你爷爷受的伤实在是太重，他让我带着他的日记就先回去了，让我通知小镇上的人来接他。;后来，等我带着小镇的人来找你的爷爷时，他却不见了，我们在周围找了很久也没有找到它。不过就在这时笼罩在小镇周围的黑暗能量也消失了！;我也不知道，或许你能在这本日记中找到一些线索,现在那股黑暗能量又开始出现在小镇的周围，或许再过不久，它们又会和以前一样笼罩整个小镇，到那个时候，保护村子的重任就在你的身上了！;现在你还不够强大，我这里有一些任务，希望你能通过这些试炼任务尽快成长起来。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Hello, boy, I didn't hear what I called you just now. Why didn't you come over? ;Sure enough, as your grandfather said, your talent is different from others, and you can see things that others cannot see. ;Boy, I have no news of your grandpa, but your grandpa once gave me a copy of something. Would you like to see what it says? ;You must cherish this thing, he will fight with you for a long time in the back! ;That's right, in fact your grandpa is a great adventurer, and he did things that we dare not do. ;Twenty years ago, my grandfather and I set out to protect this small town to find the source of the dark magic that enveloped this small town. Along the way, we encountered many dangerous monsters. ;Both your grandfather and I were badly injured in the battle with the last demon Harris, but the demon's head was not badly injured either. ;Later, the demon head was very injured and flew away, but because your grandpa was hurt too much, he asked me to go back with his diary first, and let me notify people in the town to pick him up. ;Later, when I came to your grandpa with someone from the town, he was gone, and we looked around for a long time and didn't find it. But at this moment the dark energy surrounding the town also disappeared! ;I do n’t know. Maybe you can find some clues in this diary. Now that dark energy is starting to appear around the town. Maybe soon, they will cover the whole town as before. By that time, The responsibility of protecting the village lies on you! ;Now you are not strong enough, I have some tasks here, I hope you can grow up as soon as possible through these trial tasks.
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_False: 你好哇，小伙子，刚才没听到我喊你嘛，为什么不过来！;果然，正如你的爷爷所说，你的天资跟别人不一样，你可以看到别人看不到的东西。;孩子，我也没有你的爷爷的消息，不过你爷爷曾经把一本东西交给过我，你要不要看看上面说了些什么？;你怎么还是这么调皮，给，拿着！;没错，其实你的爷爷是一个很伟大的冒险者，他做了我们都不敢做的事情。;二十年前我和你爷爷为了保护这个小镇一起出发去寻找笼罩在这个小镇上黑暗魔力的源头，一路上我们遇到了许多凶险的魔物。;在与最后的魔王哈里斯的战斗中我和你的爷爷都受了重伤,但是那个魔头受的伤也不轻。;后来那个魔头受伤很重便飞走了，不过由于你爷爷受的伤实在是太重，他让我带着他的日记就先回去了，让我通知小镇上的人来接他。;后来，等我带着小镇的人来找你的爷爷时，他却不见了，我们在周围找了很久也没有找到它。不过就在这时笼罩在小镇周围的黑暗能量也消失了！;我也不知道，或许你能在这本日记中找到一些线索,现在那股黑暗能量又开始出现在小镇的周围，或许再过不久，它们又会和以前一样笼罩整个小镇，到那个时候，保护村子的重任就在你的身上了！;现在你还不够强大，我这里有一些任务，希望你能通过这些试炼任务尽快成长起来。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_False_EN: Hi, lad, didn't you hear me calling you just now, why not come! ;Sure enough, as your grandfather said, your talent is different from others, and you can see things that others cannot see. ;Boy, I have no news of your grandpa, but your grandpa once gave me a copy of something. Would you like to see what it says? ;Why are you so naughty, give it, hold it! ;That's right, in fact your grandpa is a great adventurer, and he did things that we dare not do. ;Twenty years ago, my grandfather and I set out to protect this small town to find the source of the dark magic that enveloped this small town. Along the way, we encountered many dangerous monsters. ;Both your grandfather and I were badly injured in the battle with the last demon Harris, but the demon's head was not badly injured either. ;Later, the demon head was very injured and flew away, but because your grandpa was hurt too much, he asked me to go back with his diary first, and let me notify people in the town to pick him up. ;Later, when I came to your grandpa with someone from the town, he was gone, and we looked around for a long time and didn't find it. But at this moment the dark energy surrounding the town also disappeared! ;I do n’t know. Maybe you can find some clues in this diary. Now that dark energy is starting to appear around the town. Maybe soon, they will cover the whole town as before. By that time, The responsibility of protecting the village lies on you! ;Now you are not strong enough, I have some tasks here, I hope you can grow up as soon as possible through these trial tasks.
date.StorySpeakTextRose_True: 我好像没听到，不过我看刚才村口好像发生了什么我就想跑到村口看看。;爷爷？我已经有十年没有见到我的爷爷了，他在哪里？你有爷爷的消息吗？;原来这是一本旅行日志！;;;;啊！那后来怎么样了？;;那我爷爷还活着吗？;那我现在可以做些什么呢？;好的，魔导师，我一定完成。

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 魔导师觉的你以后会在战斗中受伤，给你一些药品是否接受？;给我吧，说不定在后面还会有用！;受伤？不可能的！怎么可能受伤！
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: The Magistrix Jarl thinks you will be injured in the battle in the future. Do you accept some medicine? ;Give it to me, maybe it will be useful later! ;Injured? impossible! How could it be hurt!
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 不错啊，没想到你这么快就完成了这些试炼。;让我看看你受没受伤。;你就是没吃过苦头，我这里有一些药品你应该会用的上！;既然这样那我就多给你一些药品，至于那件祖传的宝物我就留下了，嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿！
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Ah well, I did not expect you so soon completed these trials. ;Let me see if you are hurt. ;You just haven't suffered. I have some medicine you should be able to use! ;In this case, I will give you more medicine, as for the ancestral treasure, I left it, ha ha!

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 我这里有一个很好的装备，你要不要，想一想哦？;要;不要
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: I have a good equipment here. Would you like to think about it? ;Yes;No
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 迎来你的第一个真正的威胁来到了，在森林的深处有一只红狼，只要你能把它给打败，就能得到它身上的所有宝物，它身上的宝物可比我的好多了，嘿嘿。;嘿嘿，先别立下Flag,又一次选择的机会到了！;嘿嘿，给你！当年我就是用它把红狼打败的，希望你也有相同的运气。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Your first real threat is coming. There is a red wolf in the depths of the forest. As long as you can kill it, you will get all the treasures on it. The treasures on it are much better than mine. Hehe. ;Hey, don't set up a Flag first, here's another chance to choose! ;Hey, here you are! I used it to defeat the Hemophil Wolf. I hope you have the same luck.

date.StorySpeakTextRose_True_EN: No problem, this can't beat me, wait for me to take the treasure back! ;;

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 你竟然把红狼给打败了！;你就是会逞强，好啦，祝你好运，因为这还只是刚刚开始，听说森林的另一边最近总是有种奇怪的叫声，你过去看看那边发生了什么~

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 很高兴见到你！;我是一名旅行者，喜欢到世界各地去探险，前几天我在前面的树林里看到了一只很大的怪兽，它差一点就要吃了我。;是的，一只巨大的怪兽，不过我幸亏我跑的快侥幸躲过一劫，现在想想就后怕！;你疯啦，那很危险的！;好吧，还是你勇敢！那只怪兽就在那边森林的深处，不过我劝你还是不要过去了。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Nice to meet you! ;I am a traveler and like to explore all over the world. A few days ago, I saw a big monster in the woods in front, and it almost ate me. ;Yes, a huge monster, but I'm lucky that I ran away quickly to avoid a disaster. Now I think about it and I'm afraid! ;Are you crazy, it is very dangerous! ;Well, still you brave! The monster is deep in the forest over there, but I advise you not to pass.

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 旅行者要把多年前探险时得到的宝物卖给你，只需要200金币。;我要了，200金币拿去！;我行走江湖这么多年，你这点伎俩骗不到我！
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Caravaneer need only 200 gold coins to sell you the treasures he got from years of adventure. ;I'll take it,take 200 gold coins!;I have walked the rivers and lakes for so many years, you can't lie to me with this trick!
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 天呐，你竟然把他给打败了！;我太崇拜你了！这样吧，多年前我探险的时候无意得到了一个宝物，只要你出200个金币就可以得到它！;你就不怕我是骗子嘛？哈哈！你这么相信我，我也不会让你失望的，这个东西你收好！再见啦，勇士！

Well, I accidentally got a treasure when I was exploring many years ago, as long as you give out 200 gold coins, you can get it! ;Don't you fear I'm a liar? Haha! If you believe me so, I won't let you down, you should put away this thing! Goodbye, warrior!

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: I finally meet you, little warrior! ;I haven't seen you, but the news of your killing the Hemophil Wolf and the Zombie Puppet has spread in the town, and I certainly know that. ;Don’t be proud, little warrior, this is just the beginning. In order to encourage your performance, I want to give you a reward. You have to choose well. Pay attention to the good choice. The evil mother-in-law laughs ... ;Hehe ... ;Haha, you think I will give you the equipment? Naive! Give you experience!

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 上次小仙女给你包扎的伤口怎么样啦？;伤口早好啦，我的身体超棒的！;谢谢你对我的照顾啦！
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: How was the wound that the fairy bandaged you last time? ;The wound has been healed. I'm in excellent health! ;My wound will never heal, hee hee!
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 哎呀呀，这是哪阵大风把我们的小勇士给吹来啦！;上次我给你包扎的伤口怎么样啦？;好的，既然都那么棒了，那就走吧，不想再看见你！;我叫你走开点啦~;好，那你就在这里呆一会吧，一直待着我看你能待到什么时候。;再见，不送！哼~

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 欢迎来到荒漠世界，小勇士。;那你还是回去吧，这仅仅是个开始，后面的温度是你难以想象的。;这里叫做荒漠之地，是圣光大陆最炎热的地方，很多和你一样的冒险者都受不了这里的温度就离开了，所以我劝你还是早点回去的好。;如果你准备好了，那你就前进吧，前面是一只饥饿龙，传说已经几百年都没有吃东西了，小心它把你当成它的食物喔。;口气不小嘛，希望不要让我看你的笑话，祝你好运，勇士~

The temperature behind is unimaginable. ;It's called the desert land. It's the hottest place in the Holy Land. Many adventurers like you can't stand the temperature here and leave. So I suggest you go back earlier. ;If you are ready, then go ahead. There is a hungry dragon in front. It has been said that it has not been eating for hundreds of years. Be careful that it treats you as its food. ;Not bad tone, I hope not to show me your joke, good luck, warrior ~

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是否小点声音？;赶紧小点声音，我其实也害怕。 ;怕什么？我就是要大声！啊啊啊啊啊,快来人啊！

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 嘘！快来，别出声，你是怎么来到这里的。;啊？饥饿龙没看到你嘛？;天呐，真是厉害！我在这里呆了好久，发现旁边有条小路才偷偷溜进来的。;嘘，你可小点声，说不定是你运气好，才打过的，后面的怪物更厉害，你可别把他们都吵醒了！;还算你看得清形式，这个东西你拿好，希望你有点用！

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是否听守秘人告诉你的秘密？;快告诉我吧，我十分想听 ;不要听！我要被大火烧的连骨头都没了
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Whether listening to the Secret Keeper tell your secret? ;Tell me quickly. I really want to hear ;.Don't listen! I'm going to be burned out of bones by the fire

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 选择走大路还是小路？;选择走大路，有多少怪物都来吧;选择走小路，我喜欢做危险小的事情
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Choose the road or the path? ;Choose the road, no matter how many monsters are not afraid;I choose to take a small path, I like to do small dangerous things
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 我听守护者说这里来了一个爱冒险的小子，没想到这么快就见到你了！;那只怪物只是这里怪物的前锋，危险还在后面呢。;你看到前面那有条小路和一条大路了嘛，你可以选择走小路，哪里是怪物不会太多，但是路有点难走，需要花点时间，但是你也可以选择走大路，但是哪里的怪物就比较多了，但是相对时间会少一些;既然你选择走大路，遇到的危险一定很多，这个东西或许你能用的上，你拿走吧~
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: I heard the guardian say that here is an adventurous kid, I didn't expect to see you so soon! ;That monster is just the front of the monster here, the danger is still behind. ;Do you see that there is a small road and a large road in front? You can choose to take the small road, where there are not too many monsters, but the road is a bit difficult to take, and it takes time, but you can also choose to take the large road, but the monsters there It ’s more, but it will take less time ;Since you choose to take the road, there must be a lot of dangers. You may use this thing. Take it away ~

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 路人认为他一定死了，是否安慰他？;你一定没事的，相信我;不安慰，我看他衣服不错,估计能卖不少钱呢
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Passers-by think he must be dead, comfort him? ;You must be fine, believe me ;No comfort, I think his clothes are good. I guess he can sell a lot of money.
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 天呐，我在这里尽然发现了人类！;我是被菲尔斯抓来放到这里的。;我也好奇，本来以为我死定了，结果菲尔斯缺没有，而是把我放到这里。;但是在这里我发现了一件奇怪的事情，其实不光我，还有很多和我一样的人，他们都被剥夺了灵魂变成了一个个大蘑菇。;是！真是太可怕了。;我只知道前面是蘑菇王-洛加的地盘，如果你能侥幸打败他的话或许能知道一些什么。;我可能一会也会被剥夺灵魂吧，但愿保佑吧。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: God, I found humans here! ;I was brought here by Phils. ;I'm also curious, I would have thought dead, the result of the Phils did not kill me, but put me here. ;But here I found a strange thing. Actually, not only me, but also many people like me, they were deprived of their souls and turned into big mushrooms. ;Yes! It's terrible. ;All I know is in front of the king of mushrooms - UCLA site, if you can beat him, then perhaps lucky to know some of what. ;I may be deprived of my soul for a while, but I hope it will be blessed.

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是否跟随者巴沙赶紧撤退？;撤退 还是命要紧,赶紧溜;我是一名勇士，要面对这些困难
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Did you follow Bassa to retreat quickly? ;Retreat, life is important, hurry away ;I'm a warrior. I have to face these difficulties
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 快跟着我跑，别留在这。;你不要命了啊，快跑啊。;我是上面派来的观察者，刚刚塔卢斯已经完成了祭祀，他的能力已经得到了非常大的提升，已经到了最终阶段，如果在不走的话就没有机会了！;赶紧走，什么挑战？不要命啦？;还算识相，记得赶紧走！
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Just follow me and don't stay here. ;Do you want to die? Run. ;I am the observer sent above. Just now Talus has completed the sacrifice, his ability has been greatly improved, and he has reached the final stage. If he does not leave, there will be no chance! ;Hurry up, what challenges? Do you want to give up your life? ;Fairly acquainted, remember to hurry up!

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 小仙女在猜你给她带了什么礼物？;你猜我猜不猜;我才不猜呢，除非是只小柯基我兴许还理你
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: The fairy is guessing what present you have brought her? ;Guess I guess not guess!;I'm not guessing, except for a little cocky. I might even talk to you
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 哼，等你等得我头上都长蘑菇了，你才来！;让我想想！嘻嘻;不猜了，这没劲！看上次那劲，说不准是给我带了个保温杯！
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Hum,i wait you until there are mushrooms on my head before you come! ;Let me see! Hee hee ;Don't guess, it's boring! Seeing that last time, maybe you brought me a thermos cup!

date.StorySpeakTextRose_False_EN: Blame me, blame me, guess what I brought you? ;;

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是否请求他的帮助？;请求帮助，或许对我有用;我才不要，他要是能帮助我还会在这里么
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: Ask for his help? ;Ask for help, maybe it works for me ;I don't want it. If he could help, would I still be here
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 天呐，不敢相信我的眼睛，我竟然见到活人了！;其实在很多年前我也是跟你一样的冒险者，后来到这里时我被这里的魔王发现，就被灵魂掏空在这里。让我永远在这里驻守，让我以我自己的经历告诫这些来犯者的下场。;所以我劝你还是早点回去的吧，这里的黑暗能量是我见过最强的，你是不可能打败他们的。;那祝你好运了，或许我能帮你什么？;在这里这么长的时间我发现他们也不是什么都不怕的，他们很怕一种圣光的力量，这个小东西是我在附近游晃的时候捡到的，传说这里有股圣光的能量，希望你能好好的利用它。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Oh my god, can't believe my eyes, I even saw a living person! ;In fact, I was a adventurer like you many years ago. When I came here, I was found by the devil here, and my soul was hollowed out here. Let me stay here forever, let me tell these offenders the fate with my own experience. ;So I advise you to go back early. The dark energy here is the strongest I have ever seen, and you cannot defeat them. ;Good luck, maybe what can I help you with? ;I have found that they are not afraid of anything for such a long time. They are afraid of the power of a holy light. This little thing was picked up when I was walking around. It is said that there is the energy of holy light here. I hope you can make good use of it.

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是不是新来的？;对！没错我是新来的;新来的？你好好看看我是谁！
date.StorySpeakChooseText_EN: New here? ;Correct! Yeah, I'm new here!newcomer; Look at who I am!
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 喂，那个家伙，你站住，给你过来。;我是恶魔大厅的引路人，所有要进入恶魔大厅的人都要先经过我才能进入，我看你很面生，你是不是新来的？;以后记得带上通行证啊，好啦进去吧！

date.StorySpeakChooseText: 是否有什么遗言或者东西交给最后的幸存者？;相信我，我会击败那条万恶的远古巨龙;让我想想，我的遗言该写什么呢？

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 喂！小点声~;可能我是距离大魔王最近的幸存者吧？;我是从后面小路偷偷溜进来的，传说这里有把圣剑，如果我能偷到的话我就能变成这个世界上最厉害的人。;但是当我来到这里的时候我才发现这里的黑暗能量太强大了，我根本无法靠近！在回头发现我来的那条小路已经塌掉了，我就只能在这里呆着，期望他们不会发现我。;我只知道里面的远古巨龙拥有这个世界最强大的力量，如果想拿到那把圣剑必须要击败它才可以。;那你是否有什么遗言或者东西给我,如果我有幸找到另一条出去的路可以帮你传达到你的遗言到你的家里。;既然你有这样的气魄，是条汉子，这个东西你拿走吧，或许对你来说会非常有用。
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: Hey! Be quiet ~ ;Maybe I'm the closest survivor to the great demon? ;I sneaked in from the back path. Legend has it that there is a holy sword. If I can steal it, I can become the most powerful person in the world. ;But when I came here, I realized that the dark energy here was so powerful that I couldn't approach it at all! When I turned around and found that the path I came from had collapsed, I could only stay here, hoping that they would not find me. ;All I know is that the ancient dragon inside has the most powerful force in the world. If you want to get that holy sword, you must defeat it. ;Do you have any last words or things for me, if I am lucky enough to find another way out, I can help you convey your last words to your home. ;Since you have this kind of spirit, you are a really man. Take this thing away, it may be very useful to you.

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 我的天，没想到，你竟然打败了远古巨龙！;;;
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: My God, I didn't expect you to defeat the ancient dragon! ;;;
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_False: 我的天，没想到，你竟然打败了远古巨龙！;;;
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_False_EN: My God, I didn't expect you to defeat the ancient dragon! ;;;
date.StorySpeakTextRose_True: 一切都已经结束了，我也该回去了，我想我已经找到爷爷了。;也许在这披襟斩棘的一路上，爷爷一直在远方为我祈祷。;也许存在某个平行世界，某个灵魂纬度，爷爷从未忘记引导我成为一个像他一样勇敢的人。;我要替他去多多经历这个美好的世界，以便将来有一天遇到爷爷，和他侃侃而谈，如果可以的话。
date.StorySpeakTextRose_True_EN: Everything is over. I should go back. I think I have already found my Grandpa. ;Perhaps along the way, Grandpa has been praying for me in the distance. ;Maybe there is a parallel world, a soul latitude, grandpa has never forgotten to guide me to become a brave man like him. ;I want to experience this wonderful world for him, so that I can meet my grandfather one day and talk with him if I can.
date.StorySpeakTextRose_False: 一切都已经结束了，我也该回去了，我想我已经找到爷爷了。;也许在这披襟斩棘的一路上，爷爷一直在远方为我祈祷。;也许存在某个平行世界，某个灵魂纬度，爷爷从未忘记引导我成为一个像他一样勇敢的人。;我要替他去多多经历这个美好的世界，以便将来有一天遇到爷爷，和他侃侃而谈，如果可以的话。
date.StorySpeakTextRose_False_EN: Everything is over. I should go back. I think I have already found my Grandpa. ;Perhaps along the way, Grandpa has been praying for me in the distance. ;Maybe there is a parallel world, a soul latitude, grandpa has never forgotten to guide me to become a brave man like him. ;I want to experience this wonderful world for him, so that I can meet my grandfather one day and talk with him if I can.

date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True: 希望你能永远保护我，谢谢你小勇士！
date.StorySpeakTextNpc_True_EN: I think it's time for me to marry you, I hope you can protect me forever and forever!0000000000
